# core.functions.atanh { #optyx.core.functions.atanh }

```python
core.functions.atanh(x)
```

Inverse hyperbolic tangent.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                                                  | Description                             | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|------------|
| x      | [Expression](`optyx.core.expressions.Expression`) \| [float](`float`) | Expression or numeric value in (-1, 1). | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                        | Description                         |
|--------|---------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|
|        | [UnaryOp](`optyx.core.expressions.UnaryOp`) | Expression representing arctanh(x). |
